description: Try our easy to follow Black Forest Truffles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Black Forest Truffles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make the ganache, mix 50g melted white chocolate, 1 tbs pure cream and 2 tsp brandy (optional) to combine in a bowl and place in a small snaplock bag. Chill for 15 minutes or until firm, but not completely set.
Process dates, cocoa, honey and oil in a food processor until smooth. Transfer to a bowl and stir in coconut.
Snip one corner of snaplock bag and fill cherry centres with ganache. Place on a tray lined with baking paper. Chill for 20 minutes.
Shape 1 tbs date mixture into a ball around each cherry. Chill until firm. Coat with extra cocoa to serve.
